content:
Thank you so much for your kind words! I'm glad I could help you with your questions and concerns. It was my pleasure to assist you.

I think we've covered everything, but if you do have any more questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to reach out. I'll be here, ready to help.

Have a fantastic journey back home! May your flight be smooth, comfortable, and on schedule. Safe travels, and I hope you have a wonderful time back home!

(And don't forget to declare those souvenirs at customs!)
